name: wiz kid
text: This place is wonderful.  Great for friends who want a personal pizza made for them!  The atmosphere was upbeat and welcoming.  The food is all customizable and the drinks and different from most food places, quality drink companies.  The …More

name: Bradley Mejia
text: I love Blaze! The staff, food, and quality is always on point here and they always make my wife and I feel taken care of! I love that everything is also fast and not usually too long of a wait! I definitely recommend Blaze to anyone looking to get a high quality pizza with a build your own option in Lynchburg!

name: Tatiana D
text: I love Blaze Pizza! Fast and friendly service, always delicious food! They have a variety of options too, from Keto crust, gluten free crust, high rise crust, and thin crust. My pizza is never complete without a Blood Orange Lemonade! So good! I highly recommend this place if you’re looking for a fulfilling great pizza. :)

name: Annie Mulder
text: I love Blaze Pizza! It's definitely one of me favorite pizza places. My pizza was excellent! Hubby said his was. I didn't try it because I don't eat artichokes. YUMMY!

name: Jay
text: Amazing personal pizzas with great lemonade and other fruit drinks. They have a standard size for their pizzas but you can also get a half for $5. Full size pizza is $8-9 and will definitely fill up a hungry soul

name: Dennis Williams
text: Great keto pizza. I ordered the make your own. it is more expensive to get the keto crust, but it is the only way I can get pizza since we started this journey 3 months ago!

name: Ivan Nekrasov
text:
A very original Pizza place. I like all the options and the fact that you can get half a pizza and salad instead of a whole pizza.
Service is quick and friendly. Highly recommend for a quick bite with your friends or family.

name: Mary Saburn
text: My husband and I really enjoy the pizza. We like getting the build your own and telling them how much of the toppings we like on our pizza. The employees are all pretty nice. I think once one girl didn't pay attention to what we said when we asked for more sauce. But on the whole it's a good pizza at a reasonable price.

name: Deb Straw
text: Pizza was good.   Service could be better.   I think it is wrong to assemble a online order in front of an in person standing in line waiting to have their pizza assembled.

name: Josh Child
text: Hands down one of the best places to go.  The selection is great and I love brining my friends here when they visit LU!

name: Ai Bo
text: The subway of pizzas. Blaze is generous with their toppings. From order to eating is less than 5 minutes.

name: Ann Cotton
text: Pizza is really good, I do wish it was a but cheaper though. If you like arugula on your pizza, you can ask for it at the very end (after it's cooked) and it's free!

name: Izzy Miler
text: It’s extremely delicious food. I love you can make your owed Small pizza .

name: David Ballowe
text: Very fast and efficient service. Staff was very helpful and polite.

name: Nicholas Falls
text: The BBQ chicken was amazing, the meat lovers was also good. Love the dough knots.

name: Fadhil Winfield
text: First time eating last night around 5pm and that pizza was bomb, it was some of the best pizza I’ve ever had !

name: Kim F
text: Delicious pizza the way you want it! The staff at this location is always quick and friendly. I've never had a bad experience here.

name: Stephanie Inskeep
text: In and out pizza place. U stand in line and order what u want on your pizza and they make it. It was very quick service.  The crust was good, however it was a  little soggy for me. The pepperoni was barely cooked it seems. Personal preferece i like it crisper. All and all its a fast decent meal :)

name: Marie Cara
text: The pizza is really good. I love how fresh the ingredients are. I've only had one problem here. They didn't leave my pizza in long enough so it was kinda doughy. I spoke with the manager and he immediately had it fixed. This pic is the pizza I got the last time I went. It was my favorite build so far.

name: Patricia Edwards
text: While pizza is yummy the curbside option needs tweaking as I waited at curb too long and unable to get past recorded message when calling to alert my arrival. This was at 9 pm I was only car at curb and was clearly visible to the staff inside.

name: Katie M
text: They are very helpful and careful with food allergies! I have only had one incident with cross-contamination when they were making my pizza and they made me a completely new pizza when I mentioned it! It’s a very safe place for dairy and gluten allergies, and even my oregano allergy!

name: Teresa B
text: In so excited that Blaze now has a Keto crust! We can finally get pizza out again.

name: Janet Webster
text: Outstanding!  Build Your Own pizza - too cool!  Great topping selections.  Great prices.  Great service.

name: Wind Storm
text: You’re perfect every time!  Thanks folks!

name: mark keaton
text: Pretty straight foreword, and that ain't bad. Great pizza, friendly staff, and most importantly very clean. The atmosphere was inviting and fun. I would definitely recommend and come here again.

name: Kenneth Dawson
text: Your pizza is put together right in front of you, and then makes a quick trip through a very hot oven. The ordering process is very smooth. The selection of toppings is excellent. …More

name: Andy Anderson
text: First time visiting and absolutely loved the pizza, the crust was cooked perfect and you could actually eat the crust.  Spicy Tomato Sauce was great. I would highly recommend this place and would go back.

name: Jamieson Highley
text: Only have experience with the gluten free crust, very good crust sometimes it's better to ask them to leave it a little longer. It shouldn't be a 3.50 upcharge where most places are 1 or 2 bucks.. but great toppings

name: Michelle Wood
text: I love the pizza! I love that I can build my own or adjust a suggested pizza. The staff is friendly and welcoming. In the evening, it can be packed due to being close to campus, so seating can be difficult but it’s worth it.

name: Ann Adams
text: Pizza was great as always ...loved that they misheard my husband and called him Billy...we had such a good laugh

name: Sarah Woodyard
text: My family and I live about an hour and a half away from Blaze. We will often take a day trip down just to eat their pizza. Love it highly recommend!!

name: Diana Poole
text: Now this place has fantastic pizzas. You choose what kind of pizza you want (option to get one with as many toppings as you want) as you watch them make it while walking through a moving line...sorta like the way Subway serves it's customers. Delicious pizzas. Gluten-free pizza are offered here too.

name: Number Space
text: Wow! All of the staff were so friendly and hard working! I ordered a keto pepperoni pizza and it was delicious! One of the best pizza places I've been to!

name: Rando Rando
text: Great pizza and fast service! The Red Vine is delicious!

name: deborah moore
text: I was born and raised in Philly where you have some of the best pizza in the world and I’m here to tell you Blaze Pizza is awesome! I chose the thick crust with grilled chicken, marinara sauce, red roasted peppers, fresh basil, black …More

name: Justin Craig
text: Delicious food! Probably the best pizza in Lynchburg, honestly. Even when they're packed, its still pretty quick. The workers were all extremely nice, and professional! It is a bit on the pricier side for the size you're getting, but the flavor more than makes up for that.

name: Shannon Roberts
text: This is probably one of the best brick oven style pizza you will ever eat. They have a crust for all everyone's taste and it's always fresh and amazingly fast. Must try if you haven't already

name: amy dietrich
text: Great pizza... One decent price no matter how many toppings...I enjoy coming up with different combinations and trying new things

name: Jacob Personal
text: Great pizza and fast service. The people are really nice and the atmosphere is great. I dont like the extra $3.50 charge for Gluten free, but it's still really good pizza

name: Zach Joyner
text: This is a chain restaurant, but every time I go in it feels like the most unique and satisfying experience. It is amazing food with amazing service and amazing prices.

name: Floretology
text: Fast, affordable and good. The pizza is far better than the common fare you get from the chain major chains. The only thing I would change is the lack of pan or Chicago style pizza.

name: Brennan Lee
text: This a great fire blaze pizza place. The create your own pizza is about 8 dollars but you can pick as many topping as yo uh would like. They have alot if vegetables and meat toppings. You can get different sauces and salad and garlic knots …More

name: Glenn Williams
text: Great quality pizza cooked while you wait. The custom pie is the way to go as you can request everything or anything in any amount as far as toppings. Can get really busy at times and cause a fairly long wait.

name: Stephanie Campbell
text: Delicious pizza! Great service! I've been here about 10 times now. Always great. Love the drink choices and new cups.

name: Jagruti Patel
text: After long time I got pizza from Blaze, all three pie was burned. I would never recommend anyone go there.

name: Evelyn Angela Tallent
text: Many options and very tasty! They have vegan cheese and quick service. They also have a lot of meat and dairy options with reasonable pricing. It is like Subway with pizzas when it comes to having it your way, so I highly recommend the place. 🙂

name: Rebekah Funderburk
text: Fast and convenient, essentially a subway but for pizza!

name: Jay Harris
text: Been eating at a Culinary Art Academy for the last 4 years and the Vegan cuisine is the closest Pizza I've seen in this city. People have been taking me to every place for the last 20 days. Sometimes 5 spots in one day.

name: Wendi Staley
text: This place is amazing for young and old. You can have them create your own pizza from their wide selections of toppings or just order off the menu. The pizzas are A-Maze-Ing! You can even have a beer or 2 if you like. The cost is very …More

name: Eric McGinn
text: Great tasting pizza, great service. Nice atmosphere, even with a toddler and a baby in a carrier. The big test? PASS! My stomach feels fine even after walking right after eating.

name: Star Light
text: Very unique pizza style. Thin crust pizza's cooked over a fire. Like wait what did you just say? Yup cooked over a fire in less then a few minutes. Wonderful choice of ingredients to choose from. Things like butternut squash and brussel …More

name: David King
text: Just ordered and drink wasn’t included not. Called and was laughed at by the woman on the phone. Will not be getting my business again.

name: Robin Ferguson
text: Absolutely delish!!! Toppee off with Pesto sauce~

name: Henry Lough
text: Incredible. Ron Is Also Great!

name: J J
text: O.M.G. I love this place. Delicious pizza. Friendly staff. Very fast. If you've never eaten here, do it today! So good!!

name: Jackson Barrow
text: This is the best deal for a quality personal pizza.  The toppings are always fresh.  Excellent Quality and the price is amazing! Highly recommend this place for pizza.

name: Finatik
text: Fresh and deliciousness everytime

name: Gerald Hughes
text: Always get a great meal here. Love that I can have a beer if I want.

name: Betsy Hudson
text: I have eaten here many times and would recommend them for eat in or pick up, but I just ordered delivery and I will never do it again. Not only did the delivery driver end up in Rustburg and end up with the pizza over an hour late, it was …More

name: Julie Clay
text: We got 3 pizzas and knots. The knots were just okay. The pizzas were really good. We had a red wine, it was like a margarita pizza. It was my favorite, not very cheesy. We had art lover. My husband loves artichoke hearts and really loved …More

name: John Knaus
text: This is a great concept with fast fresh pizzas made to order.

name: Sarah Cleveland
text: Amazing pizza. Really enjoyed making my own custom pie. Quick service, friendly staff. Reasonable prices for what you get. Will definitely be back.

name: Nelson Webber
text: Great pizza at a fantastic price! Friendly service and everything's nice!

name: Team Ivy
text: Loved this place it was so awesome to create your own pizza and made right in front of you!

name: Kristen Tesi
text: I work in the same plaza as Blaze and I enjoy every single one of the employees there. Rich, Steve, and Allan are amazing at their jobs along with every other employee. They have fast friendly service and amazing pizza!

name: T B
text: Awesome vegan pizza! Vegan cheese option is bomb! Delicious. A must try! And by the way, I ordered it online and picked up in store. No issues at all. Pizza was ready

name: Kevin Schewe
text: Love Blaze pizza in Lynchburg. I try to stop there every time I'm in town

name: penny burford
text: I was great too know they have keto bread,for my first visit  it was nice

name: Keesha D
text: I love this place.  Good price, good food,  unique choices, and quick service.  The only thing that I don't care for is when your waiting for your pizza you're blocking the drink machine or the bathroom.  You're constantly saying I'm sorry; am I in your way?  Otherwise,  strongly recommend trying this place.

name: Brian Hammill
text: Really liked this place for lunch. The pizza was great and the people were helpful and willing to modify any of their pizzas to individual tastes. Salad was also good. I especially appreciated the choices of tea, lemonade, and that yummy …More

name: Denise Joy
text: exactly what I wanted and quick

name: Jonathan Beesley
text: Great pizza. Coming from Norther VA I was missing a certain location similar to this type of restaurant...this is a great substitute with many more options. Highly recommend.

name: John Carter
text: Come to try vegan cheese, keeping coming back because everyone in your group keeps getting the exact pizza they're hungry for.

name: Adam Nikulicz
text: Great food. Great people. Great place. Eat here now!!

name: Zena V Moreland
text: Loved it! So thankful this pizza place was an available option. It accommodated vegetarian and soy allergy options.

name: Dustin Sarrge
text: Workers are pleasant here and orders are completed and cooked very quickly. What i really love is they have a lot of vegan options including many vegetable choices, spicy chorizo, and of course cheese!

name: Brandon Brose
text:
Great fast thin crust pizza.
Not fast food, per se, just really fast custom pizza.
Love this joint.

name: Nikof Time
text: Ichose the tops but Blaze cooked it up and made it taste amazing. Please dont change the brand of your toppings. It tastes great. Friendly staff too. Thanks Blaze for making my trip to Lynchburg a great one.

name: Amber Zoller
text: Great pizza, great service. Love the option to place an order online and pick up quickly without having to wait in line.

name: ROBERT Kopec
text: First time in, I was impressed with the warm welcome at door, the two pizzas I ordered, and the cleanliness of establishment,  would definitely recommend.

name: Paul Hedrick
text: Get the BUILD YOUR OWN for just under ten bucks and they have sooooooo many toppings to choose from and even sacues its great

name: Debra Shepherd
text: Really good pizza and all employees are really friendly

name: Danielle Johnson
text: Gluten free, crisp crust. Great toppings.

name: Gosia Horvath
text: Lots of pizza toppings and reasonable prices, tasty!

name: Brent Scott
text: Been sick with stomach cramps and nausea since a few hrs after eating here on 7/27. If I can narrow it down to here I will never eat here again because I never want to feel like this again. Two stars is the rating without the illness. Keto crust was burnt and still not crispy. Maybe regular crust taste ok.

name: Barry Bennett
text: Good service, good food. It was very busy and I had to bus my own table. I'd go back.

name: Renee Kelly
text: Friendly place. Delicious pizza. One pizza was plenty for 2 meals. The unique beverage choices is a real bonus too.

name: Red Cesafsky
text: Awesome staff, clean tables, speedy doordash orders, and -most importantly-fresh ingredients

name: Christy O'Sullivan
text: Pizza is good. My pizza was a little too crispy for my taste but excellent taste. The staff are super efficient but still friendly. There is always a huge crowd because it is directly across the street from Liberty University. But if you …More

name: Blair Cofflin
text: The other five star reviews before me have already painted an accurate picture. The pizza is awesome! I also love the fact that you can get a half pizza and a side (garlic knots or salad) for the same price as a whole pizza now. It is a great lunch or dinner option.

name: Laura Webber
text: Pizza was delicious and a great value for the money.

name: Meg Simms Smith
text: Pizza here was so delicious! I decided to create my own pizza, and I loved that I could add as many toppings as I wanted without increasing the price. It's pretty rare that you can have a pizza with most of your favorite foods on it. Pizzas are made for one, so each person gets what he/she prefers.

name: Matt Gibson
text: Tasty and homemade pizza made to order for you as you go over options many delicious options to order.from spinach to kalamata olives to parmesan cheese is a wonderful place for you to choose

name: Joseph Kelly
text: Love the pizza, especially the fact that I can create my own. Unfortunately one of the employees told me that I was “confusing” and “being ridiculous” and was quite rude to me. Did not give me a cup for a drink and did not put the correct …More

name: Lesley Mink
text: Absolutely delicious. I have picky eater so it was nice to get a personal pizza with things I like to eat!!

name: Craig Simonsgaard
text: Great pizza.  Good prices.  Pretty fast service.  Salads seemed old(er).  Friendly crew.

name: Walter Forkey
text: The staff was very fast and efficient.  The pizza was hot and delicious . We were impressed with the drink selection.  We will be returning to this location. I had a great interaction with Jacob, while checking out.

name: Trevor Coleman
text: Quick, fast and excellent service. The pie was delicious and made very fast.

name: Donovan Day
text: Great! You should definitely try it atleast once. Build your own pizza

name: David Poiles
text: Great atmosphere, custom pizza just how I like it.  One of my favorite places to eat!

name: DW Kessinger
text: They even had a "keto" dough option for my wife.

name: Ashlea Davis
text: The employees are very friendly most of the time and the food is always good. There are plenty topping options to satisfy even the pickiest of eaters.

name: Cleta Bohart
text: So delicious and fits my Keto lifestyle! And I'm diabetic under control!

name: Emanuel Seewald
text: Great build your own pizza shop. Great dough and ingredient selection. Also great lemonade and tea options!

name: Anthony Osborne
text: Great pizza, quick fast service.

name: Dale Shively
text: Make your choice pizza and then it's cooked in a 🔥 oven. Good fun and good.

name: Marc Monteil
text: A choose it yourself ingredient pizza, very nice taste and fresh.

name: STEVEN BEARD
text: Talked to Rich, seems to be a great leader and manager over that store location!! Food was excellent and the environment was very chill/ welcoming! …More

name: Shavonne Hunt
text: Meat eater pizza 👍🏽👍🏽

name: Jenn Cailleach
text: Best pizza I've had in a long time and at a super price! This is my go-to pizza place in Lynchburg from now on. You cannot beat this place for friendliness of the staff either. Bravo!

name: Valerie Hagwood
text: I really enjoy Blaze Pizza.  Build your puzza is awesome veggies turkey meatballs grilled chicken delish. The garlic knots. Mmmmmm good.

name: T.J. Shamburger
text: Excellent service from the moment you walk in the door to the moment you leave. Fun atmosphere, delicious food, and good vibes all around.

name: Jeremy Minor
text: Blaze is a family favorite combining the power of pizza and choice. No matter how you like your pizza there is something for everyone. The only way to have a bad pizza at blaze is to get a little crazy trying the toppings. The choices of …More

name: Micah Weesner
text: This is an awesome concept for a pizza place. Start with a type of crust and build your own pizza all the way through a finishing glaze. If you want to stick with the classics you can always order a preset pizza. Either way, the food is …More

name: daniel hinkley
text: Always amazing pizza.

name: Telateau Wright
text: You tell them what you want on your pizza and they make it in front of you and it's delicious

name: Bethany Celona
text: Excellent service! Friendly staff and you get your pizza very quickly. The set up is like subway; build your own pizza or get one of their signature pizzas. The pizzas are sooo delicious!!! Nice atmosphere too.

name: Tyler Russell
text: Excellent food and service

name: Luda Kohler
text: Little bit more expensive than other pizza places. But they have arugula salad with very good dressing.

name: Rayanne Boley
text: Love their pizza!

name: ELLA RANGE
text: Love the food!!!

name: julie cash
text: This place will ruin you are getting pizza from anywhere else. It is really that good! Quick, reasonably priced and delicious!

name: Logan Weston
text: Pizza is great along with service. Only real complaint is that they put hardly any sauce on the pizzas they make. Apart from that quick delicious fire roasted pizza

name: Ernie Reynolds
text: Grat pizza great price

name: Mona Lisa
text: This isn't just an ordinary pizza place I can tell you that. You have the option to custom make your pizza and watch them make it right in front of you. This place is such a lively atmosphere and wonderful staff. Thank you for making my Lynchburg trip awesome Blaze Pizza!

name: Roberto Piedra
text:
Fresh ingredients + freshly cooked = great pizza!
The blood orange lemonade was also delicious. I was happy to use their plant based straw, just don't squeeze them too hard. Looking forward to going back soon.

name: Stephen Horstemeyer
text: Had my favorite pizza.

name: Amanda Adams
text: The pizza is great, and a good price since you basically get any toppings on the build your own, but bc it is cooked in a large oven with other pizzas, the crispiness can vary a bit. Also, the acoustics or something in this building are not …More

name: Joshua Lawhorne
text: Alwaya love this place. Create your own pizza, always busy but the wait is never that long.

name: Edward Johnson
text: Quick inexpensive and the way you want it.  Good service and kept clean.  Gluten free is very good.  Have stopped twice while on vacation.  Will return again.

name: Brandi Loan
text: Wow! Like Subway but with pizzas... we ordered a couple specialty pizzas and could add all the toppings we wanted from meats, cheeses, sauces, spices, fruits and veggies. The BBQ pizza we then ate was the best pizza we've ever tasted!

name: Chad Holzhauser
text: Great pizza get a high rise

name: James Tipton
text: Great pizza!!! You can't go wrong with this one.

name: Douglas Barnett
text: Good food; obnoxiously loud. Loved the gluten-free pizza crust

name: W B
text: This is one of my favorite places to go in this area. If you have never been here don't be intimidated, go try it out. They will ask "have you ever been here before?" as soon as you get to the ordering part of the line and they will explain …More

name: Fix-in Stuff
text: Great pizza with healthy options!

name: Natasha Harper
text: Always good! Employees are always nice.

name: Mark Boling
text: Very good pizza; Blaze Pizza will definitely be my choice next time I eat pizza!

name: steve perry
text: We love blaze.  Bringing back some acceptable coupons too

name: Tony Burns
text: Good pizza quick

name: emanuel holmes
text: Good pizza nothing special.

name: S Pilleys
text: Food always great.  Fast and friendly!

name: Charles Shepherd
text: Fast service and pleasant staff

name: A. Cramer
text: This place is a God send! They have options for all the folks with food allergies!! They actually have a gluten free crust that tastes good... seriously amazing. Thankful for this place 👍👍

name: Stephen MacCord
text: Amazing place!!! Food is great, and my kids love it!

name: Brenda Davis
text: Love the way the staff works together.

name: Much Love
text: Fast pizza great taste

name: Derek Norfield
text: Build your own pizza pie. Ingredients are all good, it is up to you to make ideal combination. Staff are friendly.

name: William Hickman
text: Have been to many Blaze Pizzas and they have all been very good.  I like the selection of fresh ingredients and their conscientous approach to preparing their Gluten Free pizza.  And the prices are low.

name: Richard Rantz II
text: Fantastic pizza, great service.. Blood Orange Lemonade is awesome!

name: Todd Olson
text: Fantastic service.  Love the pizza options.

name: Danielle O
text: A great experience every time!! Ordering on the app is recommended when you are in a rush, but still want amazing food

name: Carol Raifsnider
text: Fantastic Build your own 🍕 perfect size for everyone. Side salad options. Enough to take home leftovers..❤

name: Shannon Nelson
text: !Very good, reasonable prices, friendly service

name: J Johnson
text: Omg! I love this place and their concept. It's like a salad bar but has toppings for pizza. How cool to build your own.

name: Jesse kinsella
text: Just so fresh. I love it 🤞

name: Ana Maria
text: Best pizza in town!

name: Matt Curry
text: Great pizza. Friendly service

name: Trevor J. Collazo
text: Good pizza as usual. I wish the salads were a little better. But overall a good choice. …More

name: S.B. Robertson
text: best pizza joint around!!! personal sized pizzas means everyone is happy... also available in thick crust and gluten-free options

name: Remy
text: Absolutely love this place. Walk in to a welcoming crew and prepare to create your own pizza as you want it! With multiple different sauces, cheeses, and over 20 different toppings to choose from you can truly make an amazing pizza that is …More

name: Michael White
text: This place is really good for a lunch stop. The line moves quickly even when they are very busy. Ingredients are fresh and taste great. I've gotten a consistent, delicious pizza every time I've stopped in. If you like a thin crispy crust this place is for you!

name: Wendy Clark
text: I give it 3 because it is pricey.  Basically a small pizza for 8 dollars then you add more for drinks.   The pizza was good, but i will not go back here just because of the price.

name: John M. Maunder
text: Fun place. Tasty food. Fast service.

name: Christine Rusk
text: Delicious made-to-order pizza! Very fast!

name: Guy Mitchell
text: Good pizza, fast service.

name: Nina Scott
text: Yummy and fast!! Loved it..and has outdoor seating with great city views.

name: Jim Rogowski
text: Good pizza quick.

name: Micah Nagel
text: Excellent build your own pizza and quite affordable!

name: Jennifer Gilbert
text: 3rd time I've gotten my pizza burnt.  When they dont burn it pretty good

name: Shell Foxglove
text: Gluten-free crusts available and they ask if you need them to change their gloves! Fast service, even on black Friday! Good price, lots of choices, nice folks having a great time.

name: Elora Harvey
text: They service was outrageous and the food is amazing me and my family will be coming back very soon

name: The Hornbrook Tribe
text: It was delicious! Gluten free pizza and vegan!! I was excited! Yummy vegan cheeses and lots of veggie options! Def coming back! Very friendly costumer service and great knowledge on how to handle gf stuff.

name: Joanna Drexel-Blevins
text: Great concept, great food, great service!

name: leandra rodriguez
text: They bake the pizza in front of you. You can choose your toppings. You can also upload the app. And get points.

name: John Markovich
text: We love stopping at Blaze when we are in Lynchburg.

name: Amy Sargent
text: Very busy and loud! But great food

name: Jonathan Bryan
text:
I am a frequent flyer at blaze pizza! One of the coolest experiences in Lynchburg! Delicious pizzas with a million options! You can have it your way.
Tonight I went in and was very impressed with the girl at the front register and …More

name: Ben Ross
text: This place is brilliant! Build a pizza with whatever you want, add a drink, and it's only $11. Food is delicious and of good quality. Drinks are great too. A must visit!

name: rogue_of_blood87
text: They have great food, and the employees are really nice. I also like how it's Subway but pizza

name: Mary Jo Murch
text: Blaze has never disappointed! And as a bonus,  they offer gluten-free crust and vegan cheese so it's a place we can go even with our food-allergic children.

name: Eric Detweiler
text: Love making my own I get to try something different each time.

name: Diego Ramirez
text: Love their food.

name: R T
text: I was first person to order the Hot Link pizza, it wasn't even on their menu yet, however they knew what what came on it and it was delicious. Staff is always polite and service is great

name: Jennifer Donaldson
text: Always delicious! Always the way you like it! Endless combinations of delight!

name: Harry Betham
text: Very good make your own, reasonable priced

name: Emily Elizabeth
text: Good chain restaurant for pizza. They make it right there in front of you so if your food isn't perfect, it's your fault. It's like Subway but with pizza.

name: Derrick Benting
text: This place and concept is amazing, not to mention great customer service and quality, tasty pizza! Definitely one of my new favorite places!

name: Donna Madril White
text: Love making all the toppings I want; also love the way it's cooked. 👍

name: Sabrina Rich
text: I love this blaze!! They always have dairy free cheese 😊😊😊

name: Adam Phillips
text: Great service and awesome pizza

name: Lee Barlow
text: Absolutely awesome pizza including a vegi pizza, meat lovers pizza and even a gluten free pizza. Excellent drink choices also including a mango/orange soda that was like sunshine in your mouth.

name: Kimberly Dickert
text: Dynamite place!!! Prepare your individual pizza anyway you want! Great choices of sauces, cheeses, and toppings. It's the "Subway" of pizza.

name: Judith Ramsey
text: Great vegetarian options. Fast and reasonably priced. Acoustics make it very noisy.

name: Alyssa N.
text: Love the veg out pizza. Great prices. Definitely must check out if you are in the area and want a fast food.

name: Drew Kaufman
